turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: I'm not your daughter.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Yes you are, my dearest. You are mine and Louis' daughter. You see Louis was going to leave us. He was going to go away. But now he's not. He's going to stay and make you happy.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Why always on this night?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: What night? What do you mean?

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: You always give me the doll on the same night of the year.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: I didn't realise.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Is this my birthday?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Some of these are so old and tattered. You should throw them away.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: I have. Or there would be twice as many.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: But you're the fairest by far.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: You dress me like a doll. You make my hair like a doll. Why?

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Which of you did it? Which of you made me the way I am?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: What you are? You would be something other than you are?

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: And if I cut my hair again?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: It will grow back again!

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: But it wasn't always so! I had a mother once! And Louis - he had a wife! He was mortal the same as she! And so was I!

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: You made us what we are, didn't you?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Stop her Louis!

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: DID YOU DO IT TO ME????

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Why yours alone? Tell me how it was done!!!!

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Be glad I made you what you are! You'd be dead not if I hadn't.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: What is it now? You irritate me! Your very presence irritates me!

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Does it?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Yes. And I'll tell you something else! I've met someone who will make a better vampire than both of you.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Is that supposed to frighten me?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You're spoilt because you're an only child. You need a brother. Or I do. I'm weary of you both.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: I suppose we could people the world with vampires, the three of us.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Not you my dear.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: You're a liar. But you upset my plans.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: What plans?

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: I came to make peace with you, even if you're the father of lies. I want things to be as they were.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Stop pestering me then!

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Oh, Lestat. I must do more than that. I've brought a present for you.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Then I hope its a beautiful woman with endowments you will never possess.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Oh, Claudia, you've outdone yourself. Where did you find them?

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Drunk on brandy wine. A thimblefull. I thought of you when I saw them.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: We forgive each other then?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Absinthe? You gave then absinthe?

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: No. Laudanum.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Laudanum!

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Yes. It killed them, unfortunately. But it keeps the blood warm.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Don't Louis --

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Louis, put me in my coffin...

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: I'll put you in your coffin. Forever.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: I want more.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: What have you done?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: How did you learn to write, Claudia?

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: The way I learn everything. By watching you.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: But you never let me see you kill, Louis.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Lestat taught you all you need to know about that.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Infant death, he calls me. Sweet daughter death. You know what he calls you? Merciful death.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: He jests.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Why does he call you that?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Hush, Claudia don't talk about such things. Show me your book.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Claudia! You did that?

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Sit still. It's not finished -

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: You want me to be a doll forever?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Claudia - don't -

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Why not?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: We're immortal. You've always known that.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Tell me why...you've got to tell me...

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: You see the old woman? That will never happen to you. You'll never grow old. You will never die.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: And it means something else too, doesn't it? I shall never, ever grow up.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: You... fed on me?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: And he found me with you. I ran, sickened at what I'd done. Then he cut his wrist and fed you from him. I tried to stop him, but you were a vampire then. And have been every night hereafter.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: You both did it?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: I took your life. He gave you another one.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: But now's the time to end it, Louis. Now's the time to leave him.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: He'll never let us go.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Lestat. Oh, God forgive us.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Don't mock me, Louis. Help me.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: He's dead, Claudia, dead.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: The one good lesson he taught me, Louis. Never drink from the dead.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Should we burn him? Bury him? What would he have liked, Louis?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Don't mock, Claudia...

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: The swamp...

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: In Europe, Louis. We shall meet our own kind. Find the one who made him. Learn what it means.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: And suppose the one who made him knows nothing and the vampire who made him knows nothing, and it goes back, nothing proceeding from nothing, until there is nothing! And we must live with the knowledge that there is no knowledge.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: He belongs with those reptiles, Louis. He deserved to die.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Then maybe so do we. Every night of our lives. He was my brother. My maker. He gave me this life, whatever it is.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: I did it for us, Louis. So we could be free.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Louis, look at me.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: I can't. Go away from me.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: You never talked to me like that - in all these years.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: And you never cried -

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: I can't bear it when you do - I would die rather than lose you Louis. I would die the way he died.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Hush, Claudia, hush now my dear -

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Tell me you don't hate me Louis. I did it for you -

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: What was that?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: The workmen must have a trunk - don't stop, cherie -

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: It can't be -

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: It is! Take the back stairwell -

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: The ship is sailing wihout us!

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Not yet.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: How do I look?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Still my beautiful child.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: A beautiful child! Is that what you still think I am?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Yes...

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: You want me to be your daughter forever, don't you?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Well tell me, papa. What was it like making love?

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: You don't remember? Or you never knew.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: It was something hurries...and seldom savoured... something acute that was quickly lost. It was the pale shadow of killing.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: But how will I ever know, Louis?

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Or her, or her - or any of them?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Claudia, you torture yourself.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: They are ducklings, that will grow into swans. Whereas I must be the duckling forever.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: You are more beautiful than any of them.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Are they my kind Louis? Dolls never change either.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: You are neither, Claudia. Now stop this --

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: You know her?

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Yes. Should I take her, Louis? Among her dolls? make a doll of her in turn?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Come, Claudia...

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: But this can't be real. This is nonsense.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Nonsense all right. But something tell me it's going to be the strangest nonsense we've ever seen.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Mortals, mortals everywhere. And lots of drops to drink.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: They are here. I know they are. Listen for something that doesn't make a sound.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: They use no paint. And the audience think it is paint.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: How devilishly clever.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: She's no vampire.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: No. She's frightened. She doesn't know where she is.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: This is no performance.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: And no one knows but us...

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: This is monstrous!

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Yes, and very beautiful.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: I've seen enough of this! I loathe it!

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Be still!

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: I lothe them! I can't stand the sight of them! Stupid bourgeois Parisians, all dressed in black like some private club! I've searched for them the world over and I despise them!

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: What danger?

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: I can feel it from them! They want to know who made us, what became of him. They have their rules, their idiotic rules!

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Do you think I would let them harm you?

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: No, you would not, Louis. Danger hold you to me.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Love holds you to me. And we are in danger, not you.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Love?

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: You would leave me for Armand if he beckoned you.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Never.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: He wants you as you want him. He's been waiting for you. He wants you for a companion. He bides his time that place. he finds them as dull and lifeless as we do.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: That's not so.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Do you know what his soul said to me without saying a word? When he put me in that trance...

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: So you felt it too!

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Let him go, he said. Let him go.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: He can protect us, Claudia.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: You really believe that?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: How do we seem to you? Do you think us beautiful, magical, our white skin, our fierce eyes? Drink, you ask me! Have you any idea of the thing you will become?

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Your evil is that you cannot be evil! And I will suffer for it no longer!

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Don't make me, Claudia! I cannot do it!

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Yet you could do it to me! Snatching me from my mother's hands like two monsters in a fairy-tale! Couldn't you have waited? Six more years and I would have had that shape! And now you weep! You haven't tears enough for what you've done to me.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: Oh God! I love you still, that's the torment of it. But you know I must leave you Louis...

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Yes...

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: And who will care for me my love, my dark angel, when you are gone?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: She is dying. It happened to you too, but your child's mind can't remember.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: But if she dies...

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: It's only mortal death.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Bear me no ill will, my love. We are now even.

turns.speaker: CLAUDIA
turns.text: What do you mean?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: What died tonight inside that room was not that woman. It will take her many nights to die, perhaps yeaars. What has died in that room tonight is the last vestige in me of what was human.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: They would have killed you -

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Then my luck would have changed.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You want death? Is it death you want?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Yes...

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Who the hell are you? What are you doing in my house?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: And a beautiful house it is too. Yours is a good life, isn't it?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You're not afraid of anything, are you?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Why should I be?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: What do you want from me?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: I've come to answer your prayers. You want to die, don't you? Life has no meaning anymore, does it?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Diane!!!!

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: They are gone, Louis. Death took them. Death which you can now destroy...

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You have to ask me for this. You have to want it, do you hear me?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Give it to me!!!

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Vampires. We thrive on blood.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: I want it!

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You let your overseer run riot, work your slaves to the bone. We'll start with him.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: How do you mean, start?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Call him.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Let's call that a start.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: I can't do it.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You've just done it -

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Kill me if you will, but I can't do this...

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Don't worry. He was white trash, they come at two a penny. I dumped him in the swamp and untied the slave, licked his wounds clean.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: You're the devil, aren't you? That's who you are.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: I wish I were. But if I were, what would I want with you?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: I can't go through with it, I tell you.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Your perfect. Your bitter and you're strong.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: But why do you want me?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Because you're as strong as I was when I was alive.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You really want to be with them?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Yes. Kill me. Kill me like you promised -

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You asked for death. I didn't promise it -

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Did I hear a yes?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Yes...

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You're sure?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Sure...

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You're body's dying. Pay no attention. It will take twenty minutes at most.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Dying?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Come, you're going to feed now.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: I want a woman.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Take him.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: The crucifix -

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Forget the crucifix. Take him.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: What have I done?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You have fed. You were made for this...

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Dear God, what have I done?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You've killed Louis. And enjoyed it.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Yes, that's you, my handsome friend. And you'll look that way till the stars fall from heaven.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: It can't be...

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Give it time. You're like a man who loses a limb and still imagines he feels pain. It will pass. And we must sleep now. I can feel the sun approaching.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You must get into it. It's the only safe place for you when the light comes.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: And if I don't?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: The sun will destroy the blood I've given you. Every tissue, every vein. The fire in this lantern could do that too.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You'll get used to killing. Just forget about that mortal coil. You'll become accustomed to things all too quickly.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Do you think so?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: I know. It gets cold so fast.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: We can live like this? Off the blood of animals?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: There's nothing in the world now that doesn't hold some...

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Fascination...

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Yes. And I'm bored with this prattle --

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: But we can live without taking human life. It's possible.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Anything is possible. But just try it for a week. Come into New Orleans and let me show you some real sport!

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Have you ever been caught?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Of course not. It's so easy you almost feel sorry for them.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: The trick is not to think about it. See that one? The widow St. Clair? she had that gorgeous young fop murder her husband. She's perfect for you. Go ahead.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: But how do you know?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Read her thoughts.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: I can't.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: The dark gift is different for each of us. But one thing is true of everyone. We grow stronger as we go along.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: What have you done to me? You've condemned me to hell.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: I don't know any hell -

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Consider yourself lucky. In Paris a vampire has to be clever for many reasons. Here all one needs is a pair of fangs.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Paris? You came from Paris?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: As did the one who made me.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Tell me about him. You must have lernt something from him! It had to happen for you as it did for me!

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: I learnt absolutely nothing. I wasn't give a choice, remember?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: But you must know something about the meaning of it all, you must know where we come from, why we...

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: They know about us. They see us dine on empty plates and drink from empty glasses.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Come the New Orleans then. There's an opera on tonight. A real french opera! We can dine in splendour!

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: I respect life, don't you see? For each and every human life I have respect.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Respect me a little then. I'm the only life you know.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You fool, what have you done?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: What you wouldn't do. It's almost sunrise. It will be the sun or the fire. You said they can kill me. The sun or the fire!

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Where are we?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Where do you think, my idiot friend? We're in a nice filthy cemetery. Does this make you happy? Is this fitting and proper enough?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: We belong in hell.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: And what if there is no hell, or they don't want us there? Ever think of that?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: What, no flowery speeches? About what a monster I am? What a vulgar fiend?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: I'm not interested in you. You disgust me. I'm interested in my own nature and know I can't trust you to tell me the truth about me.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: What do you imagine you are Louis?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: I don't pretend to know.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Don't you understand, Louis, that you alone of all creatures can see death with impunity... you alone under the rising moon can strike like the hand of God.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Lestat, she's alive!!!!

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Vampires are killers. Predators, who's all seeing eyes were meant to give them detachment.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: The girl, Lestat -

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: I know. Let her alone.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Why do you do this Lestat?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: I like to do it. I enjoy it. Take you aesthete's taste to purer things. Kill them swiftly if you will, but do it! For now doubt, you are a killer Louis. Ah!

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Lestat - finish this -

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You finish her - if you feel so much -

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Unless I make her one of us...

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: NO!!!

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: THEN YOU KILL HER!!!!!

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: My God... to think you... are all I have to learn from...

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: In the old world, they called it the dark gift, Louis. And I gave it to you.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Pain is terrible for you. You feel it like no other creature because you are a vampire. You don't want it to go on.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: No...

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Do what it is in your nature to do. And you will feel as you felt with that child in your arms.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Oh God Lestat. I felt peace. I felt an end to the craving.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: That and more.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Evil is a point of view. God kills, indiscriminately, and so shall we. For no creatures under God are as we are, none so like him as ourselves.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Is God merciless? Greedy and cruel?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Ah, but we have even more in common with our creator. come, I am like a mother tonight. I want a child.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: She's here, your wounded one.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: What are you saying?

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You need company, Louis. More congenial than mine...

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Lestat!

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: You remember how you wanted her, the taste of her -

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: I didn't want to kill her.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Don't worry, Louis, you're conscience is clear. You left her alive.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Claudia, Claudia, listen to me. You're ill, my precious and I'm going to give you what you need to get well.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: Lestat, what do you mean?

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: You are the devil! You are the instrument of Satan!

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: That's enough, cherie. Stop before the heart stops.

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Your mama's left you with us. She wants you to be happy.

turns.speaker: LOUIS
turns.text: You are the devil! You are the instrument of Satan!

turns.speaker: LESTAT
turns.text: Shhhh! Do you want to frighten our little daughter?
